remarks: Value of the category of unital rings (in a universe).  (Contributed by AV, 13-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement:
ringcval.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
ringcval.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
ringcval.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Ring ) ) $.
ringcval.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RingHom |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
ringcval $p |- ( ph -> C = ( ( ExtStrCat ` U ) |`cat H ) ) $.
